data.title: Must Stop Here!
data.text: Best little candy shop in Gresham. Great caramel corn and ice cream. We love to go in and look at the fun and yummy things!

data.title: fun fun fun
data.text: great caramel corn at wonderful prices.  root beer floats and wonderful Umpqua ice cream.  This place has grown a great deal and still has great customer service and prices!

data.title: Best white cheddar popcorn!
data.text: Gresham iCandy is a quaint little spot on Main St in Gresham offering amazing white cheddar and caramel corn!  Also able to find some of the old school candy that we grew up with, as well as the old dime store feel with lots of candies in glass jars behind the counter.  Love it!

data.title: Typical candy store
data.text: Candy shop with chocolates.  Nothing special really.  You can find some vintage candy there you don't find in most places so that was nice.  They serve ice cream and a few other treats but there is no place to sit down.

data.title: If you have a sweet tooth this is your store!
data.text: Love going in this store every time I go to Gresham. Love the Carmel corn and get a big bag each time. This store also has scrumptious handmade candies and a myriad of old fashioned candies to choose from.

data.title: little candy shop in downtown Gresham
data.text: The best selection of fresh gourmet cheese and carmel corn.  choose from with or without nuts.  I bought the chocolate coated carmel corn with peanuts at 6.50 a bag.  Also famous for their over-sized snow cones with an array of flavors.  can find almost any popular candy bar there, also has a chocolates case. come n bring your kids!

data.title: Yummy!
data.text: What a great place for sweet things plus sweet gifts. The Carmel corn is wonderful and then there's the Neverending assortment of sweet and delicious treats. Great people make this a great place

data.title: COTTON CANDY!!!!
data.text: I love going into this place when I have a sweet craving. It's a bonus knowing I can get FRESH cotton candy here anytime. The place is clean and FUN

data.title: Yum, yum, yum
data.text: They have quite the assortments of all the goodies you will want. It is a candy lovers dream. Right on the main strip in Gresham. Nice to stop in as you wander through town.

data.title: Best Carmel Corn in Town
data.text: Seriously they have the best Carmel corn in town...I don't mean little old Gresham town, I mean all of Portland town. Light and delicate, you just want more. The shop is I candy for sure so make sure and only take you change in because you won't be able to resist!

data.title: Pretty little shop
data.text: Good selection, the girl at the counter seemed a little impatient and said she was ready to go home. We got a bag of chocolate, none of which was amazing, but not bad. I probably wouldn't go back though.

data.title: Great little shop!
data.text: I love the nostalgic candies they have and their variety is really great too! Their location is great cause there's so many other local shops to check out!

data.title: Cute and delicious
data.text: I candy is a great, delicious place to stop by for your daily dose of Carmel corn, cheese corn and a large selection of chocolates, and candy. They're most known for their famous Carmel corn, which is a personal favorite, not to mention the happy, cute atmosphere and great customer service made it even better! Next time you're in downtown GRESHAM , be sure to check out I candy, you won't regret it!

data.title: Good selection but pricey
data.text: They have a fun selection of candy including vintage stuff from my childhood but their prices are higher than comparable stores. Fun to visit...

data.title: CHEESE CORN!
data.text: The only thing I've had at iCandy is the carmel and cheese corn. Its like the crack of popcorn. Everything else looks delish but I keep going back for the corn!

data.title: Candy and Carmel Corn
data.text: What's not to like in a candy store?  Hot fresh carmel corn.  I love that they put the box in a plastic bag so when they fill it they can pour in an extra spoonful.  Really good individual chocolates and lots of retro candy.  Love the place!

data.title: The Best Caramel Corn !!!
data.text: icandy is part of the "main street" stores and restaurants in downtown Gresham. If you like caramel corn this it the place to go. Always fresh and warm, they give samples the minute you walk in the store. There is only one other place that even compares to this caramel corn that I have ever enjoyed. They also have a wall of glass containers of candies, sugar free chocolates and a case of chocolates to choose from. Sever old time candies are available to, like Necco's, Idaho spuds, candy cigarettes and more. Great happy staff and very clean. Check it out !!!
